Translations.Text: bhumiyannu hagu ettarada akasagalannu srstisidavane idannu ilisikottiruvanu
avanu parama dayalu – visvasinhasanadalli nelesiruvanu
Akasagalalliruva, bhumiyalliruva, avugala naduve iruva mattu bhumiya taladalliruva ellavu avanige seride
nivu adestu dhvani erisidaru, avanantu atyanta guttina hagu guptavagidalada visayagalannu khandita ballavanagiddane
allah- avana horatu bere devarilla. Avanige atyuttama hesarugalive
innu nimage musara suddi talupideye

avaru (duradalli) benkiyannu kandaga, tam'ma maneyavarodane helidaru; nivu ille iri. Nanu benkiyannu kandiddene. Allinda nimagagi kendavannu taralu nanage sadhyavaditu athava benkiya bali nanage (mundina dariya kuritu) margadarsana sikkitu
avaru adara balige talupidaga navu karedevu; o musa
nane nim'ma odeya. Nivu nim'ma butugalannu kalaciri. Nivu pavitravada ‘tuva’ kaniveyalliddiri
nanu nim'mannu arisikondiruvenu. Idiga nimage nidalaguva divyavaniyannu keliri
khanditavagiyu nane allah. Nanna horatu bere devarilla. Nannanne pujisiri mattu nanna nenapannu ulisikollalu namajh annu palisiri
a antima ksanavu khandita baralide. Pratiyobbanigu avana sramada phala nidalikkagi, nanu adannu (adara khacita samayavannu) guttagida bayasuttene
adaralli nambike illadavanu mattu tanna iccheyannu anusarisuvavanu nim'mannu adarinda tadeyadirali. An'yatha nivu nasavaguviri
o musa, a nim'ma balagaiyalli enide
avaru helidaru; idu nanna urugolu. Nanu idannu adharisi nilluttene mattu nanu idarinda nanna adugaligagi elegalannu udurisuttene. Nanage idarinda itara halavu prayojanagalu ive
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; o musa, nivu adannu kelagidiri
avaru adannu kelagittaru. Kudale adu odaduva sarpavagi bittittu
Avanu helidanu; nivu adannu hidiyiri mattu nivu anjabedi. Navu bahu begane adannu modalina sthitige maralisuvevu
niviga nim'ma kaiyannu nim'ma tolinadiyallidiri. Adu yava kastavu illade ujvala rupadalli hora baruvudu. Idu innondu purave
idekendare, munde navu nimage nam'ma dodda puravegalannu torisaliruvevu
nivu phir‌aun‌na balige hogiri. Avanu bhari vidrohiyagi bittiddane
avaru (musa) prarthisidaru; nannodeya nanagagi nanna manas'sannu visala golisibidu
nanna kelasavannu nanna palige sulabhagolisu
nanna naligeyallina gantannu biccu
avarella nanna matannu arthayisuvantagali
nanna obba bandhuvanne nanna sahayakanagisu
(adakkagi) nanna sahodara harunariddare
avara mulaka nanna balavannu heccisu
nanna kelasagalalli avarannu nanna paludaranagisu
navu pade pade ninna gunagana maduvantagali
mattu pade pade ninnannu nenapisuvantagali
ninu sada nam'mannu noduttiruve
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; o musa, nivu keliddannella ido nimage nidalayitu
nijavagi navu idiga innondu bari nimage upakarisuttiddeve
(hinde) navu nim'ma tayige higendu divyavaniyannu kalisiddevu

ninu adannu (maguvannu) pettigeyallidu mattu pettigeyannu nadiyalli haki bidu. Nadiyu adannu dadakke talupisuvudu. A balika nanna satru hagu adara (a maguvina) satru adannu ettikolluvanu. Mattu (kandavarella pritisuvante) navu nam'ma kadeyinda nim'ma mele vatsalyavannu avarisi bittiddevu. Mattu nanna kanna mundeye nim'ma posane nadeyuvantayitu

Nim'ma sahodariyu nadedu hoguttiddalu mattu ake (phir‌aun‌nodane) ‘‘itanannu posisaballavarannu nanu nimage torisale?’’ Endu kelidalu. Hige navu matte nim'mannu nim'ma tayiyedege maralisidevu – akeya kannu tampagalendu hagu ake duhkhisadiralendu. Munde nivu obbana hatye nadesidiri. Aga navu nim'mannu sankatadinda parugolisidevu mattu nim'mannu navu halavu pariksegalige olapadisidevu. A balika nivu halavu varsa mad‌yan‌navara jote iddiri. Idiga o musa, nivu niscita samayadalle bandiruviri
nanu nim'mannu nanagagiye arisikondiruvenu
nivu mattu nim'ma sahodara (harun) nanna puravegalondige hogiri mattu nannannu smarisuva visayadalli alasya torabedi
nivibbaru phir‌aunana balige hogiri. Avanu khandita bandayaveddiruvanu
nivibbaru avanodane saumyavada matanne adiri. Avanu upadesa svikarisabahudu athava deva bhaya ullavanagalu bahudu (endu niriksisutta)
avaribbaru helidaru; nam'modeya, avanu nam'ma mele daurjan'yavesaguva athava mattastu vidrohiyaguva bhaya namagide
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; nivibbaru anjabedi. Nanu khandita nim'ma jotegiddene. Ellavannu keluttiruttene mattu noduttiruttene

niviga avana balige hogiri mattu heliri; navu khandita ninna odeyana dutaru. Ninu isra'ilara santatiyannu nam'ma jote kalisikodu. Ninu avarannu hinsisabeda. Navu ninna odeyana kadeyinda, puraveyondige ninna balige bandiruvevu. Sanmargavannu anusarisuvavarige santi sigali
namage divyasandesavannu nidalagide – (idannu) sullendavanu hagu kadeganisidavanu siksege patranaguvanu
avanu (phir‌aun) kelidanu; o musa, nim'mibbara devaru yaru
Avaru (musa) helidaru; pratiyondu vastuvige rupa kottavanu mattu margadarsana nididavane nanna devaru
avanu helidanu; hagadare hindina kalagala janara sthitiyenu
avaru helidaru; avara kuritada mahitiyu nanna devara bali ondu granthadallide. Nanna devaru endu tappuvudilla mattu endu mareyuvudilla
avane nim'ma palige bhumiyannu tottilagisidavanu mattu adaralli nimagagi darigalannu teredavanu mattu akasadinda nirannu surisidavanu. Navu adarinda vividha jatiya sasyagala jotegalannu belesidevu
nivu tinniri mattu nim'ma januvarugalannu meyisiri. Khanditavagiyu bud'dhi ullavarige idaralli puravegalive
navu adarindale (manninindale) nim'mannu srstisiruvevu. Adarolakke navu nim'mannu maralisuvevu mattu innom'me adarolagindale nim'mannu navu horataruvevu
navu atanige (phir‌aunanige) nam'ma ella puravegalannu torisidevu. Adare avanu avellavannu sullendu tiraskarisidanu mattu nirakarisidanu
avanu helidanu; o musa, ninenu, ninna jadugarikeya mulaka nam'mannu nam'ma nadininda horahakalikkagi nam'ma balige bandiruveya

hagadare ninnedurige navu intahade jadugarikeyannu taruvevu. Adakkagi nam'ma hagu ninna naduve ondu dinavannu nigadi padisu. Navagali ninagali adannu ullanghisabaradu. Idu ondu tereda bayalalli nadeyali
avaru (musa) helidaru; utsavada dinave nim'ma niscita dinavagali. Andu munjane janarannu serisuva kelasa nadeyali
hage horatu hoda phir‌aunanu tannella dalagalannu sangrahisi matte bandanu
avanodane (phir‌aun mattavana jadugararodane) musa helidaru; nimage nasavide, nivu allahana mele sullannu aropisabedi. Avanu nim'mannu siksisi nasagolisuvanu. Sullannu srstisidavanu solunnuvanu
Avaru (jadugararu) tavenu madabekemba kuritu paraspara jagaladidaru mattu guttagi samalocisidaru
avaru (janarodane) helidaru; ivaribbaru jadugararu tam'ma jaduvina mulaka nim'mannu nim'ma nadininda hora hakabayasuttare mattu nim'ma srestha panthavannu nasa padisabayasuttare
niviga nim'mella upayagalannu ottu serisi salagi banniri. Indu melugai sadhisuvavane vijayiyaguvanu
avaru (jadugararu) helidaru; o musa, nivu (dandavannu) eseyuvira? Athava modalu navu eseyabeke
avaru (musa), ‘‘modalu nive eseyiri’’ endaru. Astaralle avarige (musarige), avara (jadugarara) jaduvinindagi avara haggagalu hagu dandagalella calisuttiruvante toridavu
musa tam'ma manadolage anjidaru
navu helidevu; nivu anjabedi. Khandita nive vijayiyaguviri

niviga nim'ma balagaiyalliruvudannu esedu bidiri. Avaru racisi tandiruva ellavannu adu nungi biduvudu. Avaru racisi tandiruvudellavu khanditavagiyu kevala jadugarikeya mosavagide. Jadugaranu ellige hodaru vijayiyagalaranu
konege jadugararu sastangaveragibittaru. Avaru helidaru; navu harun mattu musara devarannu nambidevu

avanu (phir‌aun) helidanu; nanu nimage anumati niduva munnave nivu nambi bittiralla! Khanditavagiyu avane (musa) nimage jadugarike kalisida nim'ma hiriyanu. Naniga nim'ma kaigalannu mattu nim'ma kalugalannu virud'dha dikkugalinda kadidu hakuttene mattu kharjurada kambagala mele nim'mannu silubegerisuttene. Nam'ma paiki, heccu tivravagiruva mattu bahukala uliyuva sikseyannu nidaballavaru yaru embudu aga nimage tiliyuvudu

Avaru (jadugararu) helidaru; nam'ma munde bandiruva spasta puravegaleduru hagu nam'mannu srstisidavaneduru navu khandita ninage prasastya nidalarevu. Ninenu tirmanisuveyo adannu tirmanisibidu. Ninage heccendare i lokada badukina kuritu matra tirmanisalu sadhya

navantu nam'ma odeyanalli nambike ittiruvevu – nam'ma tappugalannu mattu jaduvina hesaralli ninu balavantavagi nam'minda madisida ella krtyagalannu avanu ksamisabekendu (navu i nirdhara madiruvevu). Allahanu sarvasresthanagiddane mattu sadakala iruvavanagiddane
tanna odeyana bali aparadhiyagi hajaradavanige khandita narakave gati. Alli avanu sayalaranu mattu badukiyu iralaranu
innu, visvasiyagi avana munde hajaradavanu – avanu satkarmagalannu madiddare, avarige unnatavada sthanagalive
sasvatavada totagalive. Avugala talabhagadalli nadigalu hariyuttiruvavu. Avaru avugalalli sadakala iruvaru. Idu tannannu sanskarisikondavanige iruva pratiphala

munde, navu musarige divyavaniyannu kalisidevu; nivu ratri hottu nanna dasarondige horadiri mattu avarigagi samudradalli onadarigalannu nirmisiri. Nimage, bandhitanaguva bhayavu iradu (mulugi biduva) asankeyu iradu
phir‌aunanu tanna padegalondige avarannu himbalisi bandanu. Konege samudravu avarannu sampurnavagi muttikonditu
phir‌aunanu tanna janangavannu darigedisiddanu – avanu avarannu saridariyalli nadesalilla

isra'ilara santatigale, navu nim'mannu nim'ma satruvininda raksisidevu hagu tur parvatada bala bhagadalli navu nimage matu kottevu mattu nimagagi mann hagu salva (emba visesa ahara)galannu ilisikottevu
Navu nimage kottiruvudaralli nirmalavagiruvudannu tinniri mattu i visayadalli vidrohavesagabedi. An'yatha nanna kopavu nim'ma meleraguvudu. Nanna kopavu yara meleragito avanu nasavadanu
pascattapa paduvavaru, visvasigalagiruvavaru, satkarma maduvavaru mattu saridariyalliruvavara palige nanu khandita tumba ksamasilanagiddene
(munde allahanu kelidanu;) o musa, nivu nim'ma janangadavariginta modalu baralu karanavenu
avaru helidaru; avaru nanna hindeye baruttiddare. Nannodeya, nanu ninnannu veuccisabekendu aturavagi bande
avanu (allahanu) helidanu; nivu horata balika navu nim'ma janangavannu pariksisidevu mattu avarannu samiri dari tappisidanu

musa tumba kopagondu duhkhadondige tam'ma janangada balige maralidaru. Avaru helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nim'ma odeyanu nimage bahala srestha vagdanavannu nidiralillave? Vagdanada kalavadhiyu nimage tumba dirghavenisibittite? Athava nivu nim'ma odeyana kopavannu amantrisalu bayasi adakkagi nanna jotegina kararannu muridira
avaru helidaru; navu nim'ma jotegina kararannu muridudu nam'mistadindalla. Ondu janangadavara abharanagalannu nam'ma mele heralagittu. Navu adannu esedu bittevu. Hagende samiri namage sucisiddanu
avanu (samiri) avarigagi ondu karuvina akrtiyannu racisidanu. Adarinda ondu kugu horaduttittu. Aga avaru ‘‘iduve nim'ma devaru hagu musara devaru. Adare avaru (musa) maretiddare’’ endu bittaru
adu (karuvina akrti) avara yava matigu uttarisuvudilla mattu avarige yavude nasta athava labhavannuntu maduva samarthya adakkilla – embudannu avaru kanuttillave

I modalu harunaru avarodane helidaru; nanna janangadavare, nim'mannu i (karuvina akrtiya) mulaka pariksisalaguttide. Khanditavagiyu a parama dayaluve nim'ma odeyanu. Nivu nannannu anusarisiri mattu nanna adesavannu palisiri
avaru (janangadavaru) helidaru; musaru nam'ma balige marali baruvavaregu navu idannu agali dura nillalarevu
avaru (musa) helidaru; o harunare, avaru darigettaga (avarannu saripadisadante) nim'mannenu tadedittu
niveke nannannu anusarisalilla? Nivu nanna adesavannu ullanghisi bittira

avaru (harun) helidaru; nanna tayiya putrare, nivu nanna gaddavannu mattu nanna taleyannu hidiyabedi. Nijavagi, ‘‘ninu nanna hagu isra'ilara santatiya naduve bhinnate mudiside mattu nanna adesakkagi ninu kayalilla’’ endu nivu heluviremba bhaya nanagittu
avaru (musa) helidaru; samiri, ninna sangati enu

avanu helidanu; avaru kanaddannu nanu kandiddene. Devadutara hejje gurutu iddallinda nanu ondu hidi mannu hekki adara (karuvina akrtiya) mele haki bittidde. Nanna cittavu nanage hageye madalu sucisitu

avaru (musa) helidaru; ninu tolagibidu. I lokada badukinalli ninagiruva sikseyenendare ‘‘nannannu muttabedi’’ endu ninu, heluttirabeku. Ninagagi ondu samaya nigadiyagide. Adannu badalisalu ninnindagadu. Ninu astondu nistheyinda nambikondidda a ninna devarannom'me nodu. Naviga adannu suttu biduvevu mattu adara budiyannu nadiyalli harisibiduvevu
khandita, allahane nim'ma devaru. Avana horatu bere devarilla. Avana jnanavu ellavannu avariside
(dutare,) i riti navu nimage gatakalada sangatigalannu tilisutteve. Khanditavagiyu navu nimage nam'ma kadeyinda upadesavannu nidirutteve
Adannu kadeganisidavanu punarut'thana dina bhari horeyannu horuvanu
avaru sada ade sthitiyalliruvaru. Punarut'thana dina a horeyu avara palige tira kettadagiruvudu
kahale uduva a dina navu aparadhigalannu ondede serisuvevu. Aga avara kannugalu (nistejavagi) nilavagiruvavu
avaru guttagi, ‘‘nivu (ihalokadalli) hattudina matra iddiri’’ endu paraspara helikolluvaru
avaru heluttiruvudannella navu cennagi ballevu. Avarallina atyanta jananu, ‘‘nivu badukiddudu kevala ondu dina matra’’ ennuvanu
(dutare,) avaru nim'modane parvatagala kuritu keluttare. Nivu heliri; nanna odeyanu avugalannu chidragolisi harisi biduvanu
a balika avanu idannu (i nelavannu) samatattagisi biduvanu
nivu idaralli yavude eru-taggugalannu kanalariri

andu avarellaru obba kareyuvatana hinde nadeyuvaru mattu atana mattige yava adetadeyu iradu. A parama dayaluvina munde ella dhvanigalu adagibiduvavu. Andu, hejjegala sappalada horatu nivu berenannu kelalariri
andu a parama dayaluvina anumati padedavara horatu bere yara sipharas'sinindalu yarigu prayojanavagadu
avara mundiruvudannu, hindiruvudannu. Avarige tam'ma jnanadinda grahisalu sadhyavilladdannu avanu ballanu
andu ella mukhagalu, sada jivantanagiruva hagu sada susthiranagiruvatana (allahana) munde bagiruvavu. An'yayada hore hottavanu andu sotu hoguvanu
visvasiyagiddu satkarmagalannu maduttiddavanige andu yavude an'yayada athava nastada bhaya iralaradu
i riti navu avarige (dutarige) arabi bhaseya kur‌anannu ilisikottiruvevu mattu janaru satyanistharagabeku athava a mulaka avaru pathakaliyabekendu adaralli navu vividha bageyalli eccarike nidiruvevu

(Dutare,) allahane mahonnatanu. Avane naija dore. Nivu nim'medege kalisalaguva divyavaniyu purtiyaguva munna kur‌an‌na visayadalli atura padabedi. Mattu, nannodeya, nanage innastu jnanavannu nidu endu prarthisiri
i hinde navu adamara jote ondu kararannu madiddevu. Adare avaru adannu maretu bittaru. Navu avaralli sthirateyannu kanalilla
navu malak‌galodane, nivu adamarige sastangaveragiri endaga avarella sastanga veragidaru. Adare iblisana horatu. Avanu nirakarisidanu
navu helidevu; adamare, khanditavagiyu avanu nim'ma hagu nim'ma patniya satruvagiddane. Avanu nim'mibbarannu svargadinda hora hakuvantagabaradu. Hagagi bittare nivu bhari sankatakke silukuviri
illi (svargadalli) nimage khandita hasivu badhisadu, nagnateyu iradu
illi khandita nimage dahavu agadu, bisilina tapavu tagadu
adare saitananu avarannu gondalakke silukisidanu. Avanu helidanu; adamare, nanu nimage sasvata badukannu hagu endu patanavagada samrajyavannu nidaballa maravannu torisale

konege avaribbaru adarinda (a maradinda) tindaru. Kudale avara guptangagalu avara munde prakatavaduvu mattu avaru svargada elegalinda tam'mannu muccikollatodagidaru. Hige adamaru tam'ma odeyana ajneyannu miri nadedaga, dari tappidaru
munde avara odeyanu avarannu arisikondu, avara pascattapavannu svikarisi avarige margadarsana nididanu

avanu (allah) helidanu; nivibbaru joteyagi illinda ilidu hogiri. Nim'malli kelavaru matte kelavara satrugalaguvaru. Nim'ma balige nanna kadeyinda margadarsanavu bandaga, nanna margadarsanavannu anusarisuvavanu endigu darigedalaranu mattu avanendu bhagyahinanagalaranu
Innu, nannannu smarisuva visayadalli asadde toridavana palige khanditavagiyu badukina sadhanagalu tira sankucitavagibiduvavu mattu punarut'thana dina navu avanannu kurudanagi ebbisuvevu
avanu, ‘‘nannodeya! Ninu nannannu kurudanagi ebbisiruvudeke? I hinde nanu (ihalokadalli) nodaballavanagiddenalla?‘‘Ennuvanu
avanu (allahanu) heluvanu; ninna balige nanna vacanagalu bandidduvu. Ninu avugalannu maretu bittidde. Addarinda indu ninnannu mareyalagide
miti miri nadedavanige hagu tanna odeyana vacanagalannu nambadavanige navu intahade pratiphalavannu nidutteve. Paralokada sikseyu tumba tivravagiruttade mattu bahukala uliyuttade

avariginta munce navu aneka janangagalannu nasapadisiddevembudu avarige margadarsiyallave? Avaru, avara (nasavadavara) a palu bidda nivasagalalli nadedaduttiruttare. Nijavagi bud'dhi ullavarige idaralli halavu pathagalive
nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda ondu visayavu modale nigadiyagade iddiddare mattu ondu avadhi niscitavagade iddiddare, (sikseyu) igagale bandiruttittu

(dutare,) niviga avara ella matugalannu sahisi kolliri mattu suryodayakke munceyu suryastamanakke munceyu ratriya kelavu ksanagalallu nim'ma odeyana gunagana madutta avana pavitravannu japisiri mattu hagalina gadibhagadalli (allahana) pavitravannu japisiri – nivu santrptaragabahudu

avarallina kelavu gumpugalige, kevala ihalokada badukina sobheyagi navu nidiruva balakeya vastugaledege nivu drsti hayisabedi. Navu a mulaka avarannu pariksisuttiddeve. Nijavagi nim'ma odeyana kodugeye heccu sresthavagide hagu heccu kala uliyuttade

Nivu nim'ma maneyavarige namajh‌na adesa nidiri mattu svatah nivu adannu palisiri. Navu nim'modane aharavannenu beduvudilla. Nijavagi nave nimage ahara nidutteve. Antima saphalyavu dharmanisthege salluvudu
‘‘atanu tanna odeyana kadeyinda nam'ma balige yavude puraveyanneke tandilla?’’ Endu avaru keluttare. Gatakalada granthagalalliruva spasta puravegalu avara balige bandillave

ondu vele navu idakke (kur‌an‌na agamanakke) munceye avarannu ondu sikseya mulaka nasamadi bittiddare avaru ‘‘nam'modeya, ninu nam'medege obba dutananneke kalisalilla? (Kalisiddare) navu, apamanitaraguva hagu nindyaraguva munna ninna vacanagalannu anusarisuttiddavu’’ ennuttiddaru
nivu heliri; ellaru kayuttiddare, nivu kayiri. Neramargadavaru yaru hagu margadarsana padedavaru yaru embudu nimage bahubegane tiliyalide
janara vicaraneya samayavu hattirave ide. Adaru avaru niscintaragiddare mattu kadeganisuttiddare
avara odeyana kadeyinda avara balige pratiyondu hosa upadesa bandagalu avaru adannu keli geli madiddare

avara manas'sugalu (a kuritu) niratankavagive. Mattu akramigalu guttagi paraspara (higendu) matanadikolluttiddare;‘‘avanu (muham'mad.Sa.) Nim'mantaha obba manavanallade berenadaru agiruvane? Nivenu kannare kandu, matada balige baruvira?’’
